description: Searches for assets in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: additionalAttributes
parameters.description: Specifies additional attributes for the Search action. (string) ---

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Specifies the search filters. and (list) --- The --and' search filter clause in Amazon DataZone. (dict) --- A search filter clause in Amazon DataZone. filter (dict) --- A search filter in Amazon DataZone. A search filter attribute in Amazon DataZone. A search filter value in Amazon DataZone. or (list) --- The --or' search filter clause in Amazon DataZone. (dict) --- A search filter clause in Amazon DataZone.

nested_params.description: The --and' search filter clause in Amazon DataZone.

nested_params.name: filter
nested_params.description: A search filter in Amazon DataZone.

nested_params.name: attribute
nested_params.description: A search filter attribute in Amazon DataZone.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: A search filter value in Amazon DataZone.

nested_params.name: or
nested_params.description: The --or' search filter clause in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: searchIn
parameters.description: The details of the search. (dict) --- The details of the search. The search attribute.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Specifies the way in which the search results are to be sorted. The attribute detail of the way to sort search results. order (string) --- The order detail of the wya to sort search results.

nested_params.description: The attribute detail of the way to sort search results.

nested_params.description: The order detail of the wya to sort search results.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When the number of results is greater than the default value for the MaxResults parameter, or if you explicitly specify a value for MaxResults that is less than the number of results, the response includes a pagination token named NextToken. You can specify this NextToken value in a subsequent call to Search to list the next set of results.

nested_items.name: totalMatchCount
nested_items.description: Total number of search results.
